TOOL.NAME: UgropyGUI
TOOL.DESCRIPTION: UgropyGUI is adds a GUI to the Ugropy tool, which is a tool for creating pictures of molecular structures using Python code.
TOOL.AUTHOR: Juan Pablo Rovezzi

REQUIREMENTS.LIBRARIES: Tkinter, customTkinter, PIL, numpy, ugropy, pubchempy

TOOL.AKNOWLEDGEMENTS: This tool was developed by using the Ugropy tool, developed by Salvador Brandolin (https://github.com/ipqa-research/ugropy)
